scenario.title: Check that solution returns correct coefficient for a valid input of dishes are not removed

examples.step: When evaluate coefficient of the dishes
Then the coefficient of the list should be equals '<coefficient>'
When evaluate coefficient of the dishes
Then the coefficient of the list should be equals '17'

scenario.title: I want to be able remove some dishes, in which case, a new coefficient is calculated using the left dishes.

examples.step: When evaluate coefficient of the dishes
Then the coefficient of the list should be equals '<coefficient>'
When evaluate coefficient of the dishes
Then the coefficient of the list should be equals '14'
